Body: Description: The admin console is reporting incorrect serial numbers for some Windows 10 and 11 computers with multiple build numbers.   The console shows a much larger number with dashes.  Please advise.

What We've Learned Updated: We have advised the customer to try to uninstall and delete one of the affected computers and let us know the outcome, and also to attach some screenshots from the EPP Console and EPP Agent.
Next Steps Updated: Waiting for the customer's reply to our suggestions.

What We've Learned Updated: We have advised the customer to try to uninstall and delete one of the affected computers and let us know the outcome, and also to attach some screenshots from the EPP Console and EPP Agent.

We want to schedule a remote session with the customer to collect the client logs to identify if the Serial Number is correctly sent by the epp client or if there is a server issue with processing the serial number.

Next Steps Updated: Waiting for the customer's reply to our suggestions.

We are waiting for the customer to share his availability for a remote session.

What We've Learned Updated: We have advised the customer to try to uninstall and delete one of the affected computers and let us know the outcome, and also to attach some screenshots from the EPP Console and EPP Agent.

We want to schedule a remote session with the customer to collect the client logs to identify if the Serial Number is correctly sent by the epp client or if there is a server issue with processing the serial number.

The customer reported that the issue is no longer reproducing on all of the initially mentioned computers(46), and they will monitor the situation for a few days.

Next Steps Updated: Waiting for the customer's reply to our suggestions.

We are waiting for the customer to share his availability for a remote session.

We will follow-up in a few days to check if the issue still persists.
